57#ifndef OPENSSL_HEADER_DES_H
58#define OPENSSL_HEADER_DES_H
59
60#include <openssl/base.h>
61
62#if defined(__cplusplus)
63extern "C" {
64#endif
65
66
67/* DES. */
68
69
70typedef struct DES_cblock_st {
71 uint8_t bytes[8];
72} DES_cblock;
73
74typedef struct DES_ks {
75 uint32_t subkeys[16][2];
76} DES_key_schedule;
77
78
79#define DES_KEY_SZ (sizeof(DES_cblock))
80#define DES_SCHEDULE_SZ (sizeof(DES_key_schedule))
81
82#define DES_ENCRYPT 1
83#define DES_DECRYPT 0
84
85#define DES_CBC_MODE 0
86#define DES_PCBC_MODE 1
87
88/* DES_set_key performs a key schedule and initialises |schedule| with |key|. */
89OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_set_key(const DES_cblock *key,
90 DES_key_schedule *schedule);
91
92/* DES_set_odd_parity sets the parity bits (the least-significant bits in each
93 * byte) of |key| given the other bits in each byte. */
94OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_set_odd_parity(DES_cblock *key);
95
96/* DES_ecb_encrypt encrypts (or decrypts, if |is_encrypt| is |DES_DECRYPT|) a
97 * single DES block (8 bytes) from in to out, using the key configured in
98 * |schedule|. */
99OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_ecb_encrypt(const DES_cblock *in, DES_cblock *out,
100 const DES_key_schedule *schedule,
101 int is_encrypt);
102
103/* DES_ncbc_encrypt encrypts (or decrypts, if |enc| is |DES_DECRYPT|) |len|
104 * bytes from |in| to |out| with DES in CBC mode. */
105OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_ncbc_encrypt(const uint8_t *in, uint8_t *out,
106 size_t len,
107 const DES_key_schedule *schedule,
108 DES_cblock *ivec, int enc);
109
110/* DES_ecb3_encrypt encrypts (or decrypts, if |enc| is |DES_DECRYPT|) a single
111 * block (8 bytes) of data from |input| to |output| using 3DES. */
112OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_ecb3_encrypt(const DES_cblock *input,
113 DES_cblock *output,
114 const DES_key_schedule *ks1,
115 const DES_key_schedule *ks2,
116 const DES_key_schedule *ks3,
117 int enc);
118
119/* DES_ede3_cbc_encrypt encrypts (or decrypts, if |enc| is |DES_DECRYPT|) |len|
120 * bytes from |in| to |out| with 3DES in CBC mode. 3DES uses three keys, thus
121 * the function takes three different |DES_key_schedule|s. */
122OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_ede3_cbc_encrypt(const uint8_t *in, uint8_t *out,
123 size_t len,
124 const DES_key_schedule *ks1,
125 const DES_key_schedule *ks2,
126 const DES_key_schedule *ks3,
127 DES_cblock *ivec, int enc);
128
129/* DES_ede2_cbc_encrypt encrypts (or decrypts, if |enc| is |DES_DECRYPT|) |len|
130 * bytes from |in| to |out| with 3DES in CBC mode. With this keying option, the
131 * first and third 3DES keys are identical. Thus, this function takes only two
132 * different |DES_key_schedule|s. */
133OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_ede2_cbc_encrypt(const uint8_t *in, uint8_t *out,
134 size_t len,
135 const DES_key_schedule *ks1,
136 const DES_key_schedule *ks2,
137 DES_cblock *ivec, int enc);
138
139
140/* Deprecated functions. */
141
142/* DES_set_key_unchecked calls |DES_set_key|. */
143OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_set_key_unchecked(const DES_cblock *key,
144 DES_key_schedule *schedule);
145
146OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_ede3_cfb64_encrypt(const uint8_t *in, uint8_t *out,
147 long length, DES_key_schedule *ks1,
148 DES_key_schedule *ks2,
149 DES_key_schedule *ks3,
150 DES_cblock *ivec, int *num, int enc);
151
152OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_ede3_cfb_encrypt(const uint8_t *in, uint8_t *out,
153 int numbits, long length,
154 DES_key_schedule *ks1,
155 DES_key_schedule *ks2,
156 DES_key_schedule *ks3,
157 DES_cblock *ivec, int enc);
158
159
160/* Private functions.
161 *
162 * These functions are only exported for use in |decrepit|. */
163
164OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_decrypt3(uint32_t *data, const DES_key_schedule *ks1,
165 const DES_key_schedule *ks2,
166 const DES_key_schedule *ks3);
167
168OPENSSL_EXPORT void DES_encrypt3(uint32_t *data, const DES_key_schedule *ks1,
169 const DES_key_schedule *ks2,
170 const DES_key_schedule *ks3);
171
172
173#if defined(__cplusplus)
174} /* extern C */
175#endif
176
177#endif /* OPENSSL_HEADER_DES_H */
178
